content: i m giving directions to knit this hat in the round i used my interchangeable needles and the magic loop method i m sure there are some good tutorials available if you haven t got the hang of it yet dpns would also be fine additionally you could easily knit this hat flat and then seam it before picking up the ears it s pretty versatile requires less than one ball of yarn you could use a contrast yarn for the ears my gauge was 20sts to 10cm row gauge is not too important
